== Our Goals ==

Most of our goals are only short term. These can be found in our <nowiki>[[ https:--blueprints.launchpad.net-ubuntu-southdakota-+spec-perfect-loco | Road Maps ]]</nowiki>.

Static Goals:
* Distribute Ubuntu CDs everywhere.
* Advocate free and open source solutions (FOSS).
* Promote Ubuntu in the area.
* Provide support for new users.
* Create a community driven team.
